mutants.code:
def max_unbroken_sequence(my_string):
    prev_char = 'MUTATED'
    max_count = 0
    current_count = 0
    sequence = ''
    max_sequence = ''
    for char in my_string:
        if char == prev_char:
            current_count += 1
            sequence += char
        else:
            current_count = 1
            sequence = char
        if current_count > max_count:
            max_count = current_count
            max_sequence = sequence
        prev_char = char
    return max_sequence
